bio: I am a motivated and detail-oriented engineer with a background in Electronics and Communication Engineering, currently pursuing my Master's in Computer Engineering at Paderborn University, Germany. I am driven by a strong passion for technology, innovation, and building solutions that address real-world challenges.

I previously served as a Migration Analyst at Tata Consultancy Services (TCS), where I applied my technical and analytical skills to deliver efficient, scalable cloud migration solutions. In addition, I completed a research internship at the Space Applications Centre (ISRO), contributing to the development of advanced satellite communication systems.

My current academic focus lies in advanced computing, cloud technologies, and intelligent systems. I hold triple certifications in Google Cloud and AWS, and am particularly interested in bridging embedded systems with cloud computing to create impactful, real-world innovations.
keyAchievements: Optimized cloud migration pipelines achieving 45% reduction in query execution time and 35% decrease in infrastructure costs
Executed zero-loss migrations across 100+ databases with 100% data integrity
Engineered DSP-based signal processing systems achieving 99% signal recovery rate across 50+ satellite channels at ISRO
Developed PLL algorithm achieving 25% reduction in positioning error with sub-meter accuracy
Triple certified: Google Professional Cloud Architect, Google Associate Cloud Engineer, AWS Developer Associate

responsibilities: Optimized cloud-to-cloud migration pipelines achieving 45% reduction in query execution time and 35% decrease in infrastructure costs, enabling faster data transfers and improved system performance through strategic pipeline design and resource allocation

Implemented comprehensive data validation framework achieving 45% increase in data match hit ratio and 93% reduction in lookup time, ensuring data accuracy and integrity through advanced schema analysis and intelligent mapping techniques

Executed zero-loss migrations across 100+ databases with 100% data integrity, minimizing system downtime and business disruption through robust testing protocols while maintaining strict compliance with security and privacy standards

Engineered DSP-based signal processing systems achieving 99% signal recovery rate across 50+ satellite channels, enabling reliable down conversion and data recovery for mission-critical operations through advanced filtering and demodulation techniques
Developed phase-locked loop (PLL) algorithm achieving 25% reduction in positioning error and sub-meter accuracy, improving satellite navigation precision for real-time Doppler tracking applications

Implemented adaptive filtering and carrier tracking algorithms achieving 35% improvement in signal stability and 40% reduction in signal loss, delivering production-ready solutions for noisy communication environments

Built multi-sensor IoT monitoring system achieving 80% reduction in manual overhead and monitoring 10+ environmental parameters, automating real-time data acquisition and alerting through Arduino Uno integration and cloud connectivity

Optimized sensor responsiveness achieving sub-100ms reaction time and 95% event detection accuracy, improving system reliability through interrupt-driven processing and optimized event logic for environmental monitoring applications

projects.title: Smart Stove Safety System (IoT-Based)
projects.description: Developed sensor-based stove safety system achieving 99% gas leak detection accuracy and preventing 100% of potential hazards. Implemented automatic shutdown mechanism and real-time SMS/email alerts through integrated sensor fusion and IoT connectivity with sub-100ms response time.

certifications.name: Google Cloud Associate Cloud Engineer
certifications.description: Demonstrates ability to deploy applications, monitor operations, and manage enterprise solutions on Google Cloud Platform

certifications.name: Google Professional Cloud Architect
certifications.description: Validates expertise in designing, developing, and managing robust, secure, scalable, and dynamic cloud architecture solutions

certifications.name: AWS Developer Associate
certifications.description: Demonstrates proficiency in developing, deploying, and debugging cloud-based applications using AWS services
